en.MAIN_MENU_LEADERBOARD_DESCRIPTION: Track stats from your recent games.
en.MAIN_MENU_BACK_TO_PACK_DESCRIPTION: Exit back to the Party Pack.
en.MAIN_MENU_HELP_LINE_1:
Select which game you want to play.
Each game is started from the Game Picker screen using a controller.
en.MAIN_MENU_HELP_LINE_2:
Once you've reached the lobby screen, GET OUT YOUR PHONE OR TABLET!
All you need to play each game is a web-connected phone, tablet or laptop! No controllers needed!
en.MAIN_MENU_HELP_LINE_3:
Simply go to jackbox.tv on your mobile device.
Each game us accessed through a website, but is played via the system.
en.MAIN_MENU_HELP_LINE_4:
Enter the 4-letter room code shown on the TV screen.
Every new game started has a unique room code.
en.MAIN_MENU_HELP_LINE_5:
Enter your player name.
Player on mobile devices means easy access to keyboards!
en.MAIN_MENU_HELP_LINE_6:
Once all players are ready, hit the “EVERYBODY'S IN” button to play!
Wheeee!
en.LOBBY_CONNECTING_DELAY:
This is taking a while...
Please check your internet connection.
en.LOBBY_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: on your mobile device to join in
en.LOBBY_AUDIENCE_INFLUENCE: Your votes will influence the game!
en.INTRO_DISCLAIMER: NOTE: In case you weren't sure, Jackbox Games doesn't know how to do surveillance. We just surveyed people on the internet.
en.ROUND_EXTRA_POINTS: Spot the large mistakes and get extra points by using the much lower or much higher buttons.
en.ROUND_BONUS_DESCRIPTION: Use your tokens to find the top three answers to this question.
en.ROUND_FINAL_DESCRIPTION: Everybody enters a percentage, the closer it is from the answer, the more points.
en.SETTINGS_FULL_SCREEN_DESCRIPTION: ON will make the game full-screen.
en.SETTINGS_VOLUME_DESCRIPTION: Make the game LOUD or QUIET.
en.SETTINGS_FAMILY_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION: Turn ON to avoid the most provocative content.
en.SETTINGS_AUDIENCE_TIMERS_DESCRIPTION: Extends timers to give the audience more time to respond.
en.SETTINGS_AUDIENCE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Audience Mode ON means non-players can join and affect the game.
en.SETTINGS_AUDIENCE_POLLING_DESCRIPTION: Poll the live audience instead of using the game's survey results.
en.SETTINGS_TWITCH_LOGIN_DESCRIPTION: Players must log to Twitch to join the game.
en.SETTINGS_HIDE_ROOM_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Allow the room code to be hidden on screen.
en.SETTINGS_START_GAMEPAD_DESCRIPTION: Games must be started with controller, not from player devices.
